headline: Bolt Threads introduces Mylo, a revolutionary vegan leather alternative
summary: California-based biotech company Bolt Threads introduces Mylo, a next-gen material that replicates animal leather's performance and feel

headline: TNO Creates 3D-printed lab-grown prawns using cellular agriculture
summary: Researchers at TNO successfully develop the first 3D-printed lab-grown prawns using cellular agriculture technology

headline: Nestle debuts plant-based steak made via precision fermentation
summary: Swiss food giant Nestle unveils Lab-grown beef steak using precision fermentation technology

headline: Lvvup unveils Mymosh, a line of sustainable, leather-like materials
summary: Lvvup's Mymosh line of products offers leather-like materials that are biodegradable and sustainable

headline: Ecovative Design partners with Nike for biodegradable shoe components
summary: Ecovative Design teams up with Nike to create biodegradable materials and components for the shoe industry

headline: Wild Type introduces lab-grown salmon with same nutritional value as wild salmon
summary: California-based Wild Type launches cell-based salmon with identical nutritional values to wild-caught salmon

headline: Impossible Foods launches dairy-free cheese made with precision fermentation
summary: Impossible Foods enters the dairy-free cheese market with their new plant-based product made using precision fermentation

headline: MycoWorks unveils Rehau Drainage System with Mycelium-based materials
summary: MycoWorks partners with RHEINZINK to create sustainable, mycelium-based materials for drainage systems
